content:
Hello,
I am really excited to contribute to this year's project proposal. They are amazing and quite challenging, but I believe they can be completed before a given time interval. This will surely be accepted in GSoD,21. I found them via a season of doc repo.

I have gone through all the minimum scope mentioned for this project as on the website. With some conversions being automatic, while some required to be converted manually. I believe this can be completed before the end date. I have been passionately writing tutorials, blogs, reviews about open-source projects and am familiar with DocBook XML and AsciiDoc. Gone through different conversion ideas, I believe I have got some idea of how to proceed with the conversion.

You can find my previous work at medium, hashnode . I would give my best to achieve this goal.
Could you please provide my some more reference, so that I may get into depth in this project. Any feedback and suggestion are most welcome.
